title: Caribbean Pools Brand Evolution
tagline: A decade-long brand transformation from $7M to $17M

context.problem: Inconsistent brand presence across channels—uniforms, signage, and vehicles used different logo versions and colors. Multiple vendors with no unified guidelines.
context.quote: We needed one brand, one voice, one look—everywhere.

solution.approach: Comprehensive brand system overhaul including style guide development, logo modernization, fleet wraps, uniform production, and standardized signage templates with consistent messaging.
bullets: Modernized logo lockups and color systems
Wrapped 20+ fleet vehicles with unified design
Standardized all signage and print templates

process.title: System Design
process.description: Create style guide, templates, and standards

process.title: Implementation
process.description: Roll out across fleet, apparel, signage, and digital

process.title: Internal Training
process.description: Train team on brand standards and usage

process.title: Continuous Refinement
process.description: Monitor and iterate based on feedback

reflection.learning: Brand consistency isn't a project—it's a system. When everyone owns the standards, the brand maintains itself.
